zh: 添加当前笔刷到笔刷库

id: Create a screenshot of the current graph
zh: 创建当前图形的屏幕截图

id: Generate screenshots for the library nodes
zh: 为库节点生成屏幕截图
显示选定的库项目文档

id: Change seed (left mouse button) / Show seed menu (right mouse button)
zh: 更改种子（鼠标左键）/显示种子菜单（鼠标右键）

id: 99% of Material Maker's code is the awesome Godot Engine
zh: Material Maker 的 99% 的代码都是很棒的 Godot 引擎

id: Adjusts the Hue, Saturation and Value of its input
zh: 调整其输入的色相、饱和度和值

id: Shows the image with adjusted Hue, Saturation and Value
zh: 显示调整了色相、饱和度和值的图像

id: Draws a white shape on a black background
zh: 在黑色背景上绘制白色形状

id: The number of repetitions of the whole pattern
The number of bricks per row
The width of the space between bricks
The width of the edge of each brick
A greyscale image that shows the bricks pattern
zh: 显示砖块图案的灰度图像

id: A random color for each brick
An UV map output for each brick, to be connected to the Map input of a CustomUV node
zh: 每个砖块的 UV 贴图输出，连接到 用户定义UV 节点的 贴图输入

id: Finds the minimum and maximum values in the input texture and tone maps it to the full 0.0 - 1.0 range.
zh: 查找输入纹理中的最小值和最大值，并将其色调映射到完整的 0.0 - 1.0 范围。
显示生成的重映射图像

id: Buffers are used to find the mininum and maximum values for the input image. If the input has small details a higher resolution buffer might be needed to capture precise min and max values.\n\nNote: The output itself will not be buffered.
zh: 缓冲区用于查找输入图像的最小值和最大值。如果输入有小细节，可能需要更高分辨率的缓冲区来捕获精确的最小值和最大值。\n\n注意：输出本身不会被缓冲。

id: Draws a greyscale hexagonal tiles pattern
zh: 绘制灰度六边形贴块图案

id: The number of columns of the pattern
The number of rows of the pattern
Shows a random color for each hexagonal tile
zh: 显示每个六边形贴块的随机颜色

id: Shows an UV map to be connected to the UV map port of the Custom UV node
zh: 显示要连接到自定义 UV 节点的 UV 贴图端口的 UV 贴图

id: Blends its input, using an optional mask
zh: 使用可选遮罩混合其输入

id: The algorithm used to blend the inputs
The opacity of the blend operation
Shows the result of the blend operation
X coordinate of the center of the box
zh: 盒子中心的 X 坐标

id: Y coordinate of the center of the box
zh: 盒子中心的 Y 坐标

id: Z coordinate of the center of the box
zh: 盒子中心的 Z 坐标

id: A heightmap of the specified box
Generates different bricks patterns, with many useful outputs.
zh: 生成不同的砖块图案，具有许多有用的输出。

id: The number of rows of a pattern
The number of columns of a pattern
The offset of the pattern (not useful for all patterns)
zh: 图案的偏移量（不适用于所有图案）

id: The radius of the round corners of bricks
The size of the corner part of each brick (only used by the Corner UV output)
zh: 每块砖的拐角部分的大小（仅由拐角 UV 输出使用）

id: A map that affects the Mortar parameter
A map that affects the Bevel parameter
A map that affects the Round parameter
zh: 影响 Round 参数的贴图

id: The position of each brick along the X axis
zh: 每块砖沿 X 轴的位置

id: The position of each brick along the Y axis
zh: 每块砖沿 Y 轴的位置

id: An UV map output for each brick corner, to be connected to the Map input of a CustomUV node
zh: 每个-砖角-的 UV 贴图输出，连接到 用户定义UV 节点的 贴图 输入

id: The direction of each brick (white: horizontal, black: vertical)
zh: 每块砖的方向(白色：水平，黑色：垂直)
生成不均匀的砖块图案。

id: The number of iterations of the brick split operation
The minimum size of a brick
Adjusts the Brightness and Contrast of its input
zh: 调整其输入的亮度和对比度

id: Shows the image with modified Brightness and Contrast
zh: 显示具有修改亮度和对比度的图像

id: Maps its input into a circle
zh: 将其输入映射为一个圆圈

id: The radius of the circle where the input is mapped
The number of repetitions of the input image around the circle
zh: 输入图像围绕圆圈的重复次数

id: The input image to be remapped
zh: 要重新映射的输入图像

id: Spreads several occurences of an input image in a circle or spiral pattern.
zh: 以圆形或螺旋图案传播输入图像的多个出现。

id: The number of occurences of the input image
The number of rings of the circle pattern

The input type of the node:
- 1: single image
- 4: atlas of 4 images
- 16: atlas of 16 images
Atlases can be created using the Tile2x2 node.
zh:
节点的输入类型:
- 1:单个图像
- 4:包含4个图像的图集
- 16:包含16个图像的图集
图集可以使用2x2贴块节点创建。

id: The scale of input images on the X axis
zh: X 轴上输入图像的比例

id: The scale of input images on the Y axis
The radius of the outer circle pattern
The type of pattern:\n- 0: circles\n- 1: spiral
The rotate increment along the pattern
The scale increment of the pattern
The random rotation applied to each image instance
zh: 应用于每个图像实例的随机旋转

id: The random scale applied to each image instance
zh: 应用于每个图像实例的随机比例

id: The random greyscale value applied to each image instance
zh: 应用于每个图像实例的随机灰度值

id: The input image or atlas of 4 or 16 input images
zh: 输入图像或 4 或 16 个输入图像的图集

id: The mask applied to the pattern
Shows a random color for each instance of the input image
zh: 为输入图像的每个实例显示随机颜色

id: The random opacity applied to each image instance
zh: 应用于每个图像实例的随机不透明度

id: Number of repetitions of the gradient
Gradient to be spread on the image
zh: 要在图像上传播的渐变

id: Generates a grid made of random color squares
zh: 生成由随机颜色方块组成的网格

id: Remaps a greyscale image to a custom gradient
zh: 将灰度图像重新映射到自定义渐变

id: The gradient to which the input is remapped
zh: 输入重新映射到的梯度
重新映射的 RGBA 图像

id: Combines 4 greyscale inputs into an RGBA image
zh: 将 4 个灰度输入组合成一个 RGBA 图像

id: The greyscale input for the red channel
The greyscale input for the green channel
The greyscale input for the blue channel
The greyscale input for the alpha channel

zh: 显示组合的 RGBA 图像

id: Position on X axis of the first control point
zh: 第一个控制点在 X 轴上的位置

id: Position on Y axis of the first control point
zh: 第一个控制点在 Y 轴上的位置

id: Position on X axis of the second control point
zh: 第二个控制点在 X 轴上的位置

id: Position on Y axis of the second control point
zh: 第二个控制点在 Y 轴上的位置

id: Position on X axis of the third control point
zh: 第三个控制点在 X 轴上的位置

id: Position on Y axis of the third control point
zh: 第三个控制点在 Y 轴上的位置

id: Number of repetitions of the input pattern
Input pattern to be drawn along the curve
zh: 沿曲线绘制的输入图案

id: An image showing the specified curve

zh: 自定义 UV 重映射器

id: Remaps an Input image using a custom UV map.
zh: 使用自定义 UV 贴图重新映射输入图像。

id: The scale of the input image along the X axis.
zh: 输入图像沿 X 轴的比例。

id: The scale of the input image along the Y axis.
zh: 输入图像沿 Y 轴的比例。

id: The random rotation applied to each remapped instance.
zh: 应用于每个重新映射实例的随机旋转。

id: The random scale applied to each remapped instance.
zh: 应用于每个重新映射实例的随机比例。

id: The image or atlas of images to be remapped.
zh: 要重新映射的图像或图像集。

id: The custom UV map to be used for remapping.
zh: 用于重新映射的自定义 UV 贴图。

id: Decomposes an RGBA input into 4 greyscale images
zh: 将 RGBA 输入分解为 4 个灰度图像

id: Shows the Red channel of the input
Shows the Green channel of the input
Shows the Blue channel of the input
Shows the Alpha channel of the input
zh: 显示输入的透明度通道

id: Fast  spatial deNoise filter, with circular gaussian kernel.
zh: 具有圆形高斯核的快速空间降噪滤波器。

id: The input image to be denoised

K factor sigma coefficient.
kSigma = 1*sigma cover 68% of data
kSigma = 2*sigma cover 95% of data - but there are over 3 times  more points to compute
kSigma = 3*sigma cover 99.7% of data - but needs more than double the calculations of 2*sigma
zh:
K 因子 西格玛 系数。
k西格玛 = 1*西格玛 覆盖了 68% 的数据
k西格玛 = 2*西格玛 覆盖了 95% 的数据 - 但要计算的点数是 3 倍以上
k西格玛 = 3*西格玛 覆盖了 99.7% 的数据 -但需要两倍以上的 2*西格玛 计算

id: Dilates the white areas of a mask, using the colors of an optional input
zh: 使用可选输入的颜色扩大蒙版的白色区域

id: The resolution of the input images
The length of the dilate effect
0 to generate a gradient to black while dilating, 1 to fill with input color
zh: 0 在扩张时生成黑色渐变，1 用输入颜色填充

id: The input mask whose white areas will be dilated
zh: 白色区域将被扩大的输入遮罩

id: Applies a directional gaussian blur to its input
zh: 将定向高斯模糊应用于其输入

id: The strength of the blur filter
The angle of the directional blur effect
A map that controls the strength of the blur filter
zh: 控制模糊滤镜强度的贴图

id: An edge detect filter that detects edges along all directions and draws them in white on a black background
zh: 一个边缘检测过滤器'可检测所有方向的边缘并在黑色背景上以白色绘制它们

id: The resolution of the input image
An edge detect filter that detects edges horizontally and vertically and draws them in white on a black background
zh: 一个边缘检测过滤器’用于检测水平和垂直边缘'并在黑色背景上以白色绘制它们

id: An edge detect filter that detects edges along diagonals and draws them in white on a black background
zh: 边缘检测过滤器'可检测沿对角线的边缘并在黑色背景上以白色绘制它们

id: Creates highlights and shadows from an input heightmap
zh: 从输入高度图创建高光和阴影

id: The angle of the simulated light
The strength of the emboss effect
The width (in pixels) of the area sampled for each pixel
zh: 为每个像素采样的区域的宽度（以像素为单位）

id: The resolution used to sample the input image
zh: 用于对输入图像进行采样的分辨率

id: The standard deviation of the gaussian distribution
The quality of the effect (increasing quality increases compute time)
zh: 效果的质量（提高质量会增加计算时间）

id: Generates a noise made of several octaves of a simple noise
zh: 产生由简易噪波的几个八度音程组成的噪波

id: The scale of the first octave along the X axis
zh: 沿 X 轴的第一个八度音阶的刻度

id: The scale of the first octave along the Y axis
zh: 沿 Y 轴的第一个八度音阶的音阶

id: The number of times the basic noise is folded
zh: 基本噪波被折叠的次数

id: The persistence between two consecutive octaves
Shows a greyscale image of the generated noise
zh: 显示生成噪波的灰度图像

id: Fills areas defined by white outlines of its input
zh: 填充由其输入的白色轮廓定义的区域

id: The input image whose white outlines must be filled
zh: 必须填充白色轮廓的输入图像

id: Generates fill data, to be connected to a fill companion node
zh: 生成填充数据，连接到填充伴随节点

id: The resolution of the inptu image
The number of iterations of the algorithm. The optimal value depends a lot on the input image.
zh: 算法的迭代次数。最佳值很大程度上取决于输入图像。

id: A fill companion node that fills each area with a color taken from a color map image
zh: 一个填充伴随节点'用从颜色图图像中获取的颜色填充的每个区域

id: The color used to draw outlines
The input fill data, to be connected to the output of a Fill node
zh: 输入填充数据，连接到填充节点的输出

id: The image from which colors are taken
zh: 用于从中获取颜色的图像

id: A fill companion node that fills each area with a greyscale value that depends on its position
zh: 一个填充伴随节点'用取决于其位置的灰度值填充每个区域

id:
The position value to be used:
- X for horizontal axis
- Y for vertical axis
- Radial for distance to center
zh:
要使用的位置值：
- X 代表水平轴
- Y 代表垂直轴
- Radial 代表到中心的距离

id: A fill companion node that fills each area with a random color
zh: 用随机颜色填充每个区域的填充伴随节点

id: A fill companion node that fills each area with a random greyscale value
zh: 用随机灰度值填充每个区域的填充伴随节点

id: The value used for the outlines
A fill companion node that fills each area with a greyscale value that depends on its size
zh: 一个填充伴随节点'用取决于其大小的灰度值填充每个区域

id: The size value to be used (area, width, height or maximum between width and height)
zh: 要使用的尺寸值(面积、宽度、高度或宽度和高度之间的最大值)

id: A fill companion node that generated an UV map that follows each filled area
zh: 一个填充伴随节点'生成一个跟随每个填充区域的 UV 贴图

id: The mode decides how the UVs are layed out on each bounding box:\n- Stretch mode where the UV layout is stretched to the bounding box. \n- Square mode where the UV layout is even and centerered based on the longest axis of the bounding box.
zh: 该模式决定了 UV 在每个边界框上的布局方式：\n- 拉伸模式，其中 UV 布局被拉伸到边界框。\n- 方形模式，其中 UV 布局是基于边界框的最长轴均匀并居中的。

id: The generated output UV map, to be connected to a Custom UV node
zh: 生成的输出 UV 贴图，连接到自定义 UV 节点

id: Applies a gaussian blur on its input
zh: 对其输入应用高斯模糊

id: Apply the blur filter horizontally, vertically of in both directions
zh: 水平、垂直或双向应用模糊滤镜

id: The algorithm used to convert the input into greyscale
zh: 用于将输入转换为灰度的算法

id: Shows the image converted to greyscale
zh: 显示转换为灰度的图像

id: Generates an angle map to be used by Advances Tiler nodes from a heightmap
zh: 从高度图生成供 高级贴块器 节点使用的角度图

id: The offset angle applied to the generated map
zh: 应用于生成贴图的偏移角度

id: The generated angle map. Values are between -1 and 1 and the corresponding Advanced Tiler parameter (Rotate) must be set to 180.
zh: 生成的角度图。值介于 -1 和 1 之间'并且相应的 高级贴块器 参数（旋转）必须设置为 180。

id: This node generates a grid of random I Ching hexagrams.
zh: 该节点生成随机易经卦的网格。

id: The number of columns of the grid
The number of rows of the grid
A greyscale image showing random I Ching hexagrams.
zh: 显示随机易经卦的灰度图像。

id: A filter that inverts the R, G, and B channels of its input while keeping the A channel unchanged
zh: 一种滤波器，它反转其输入的 R、G 和 B 通道，同时保持 A 通道不变

id: Replicated an angle of the input image several times around the center.
zh: 围绕中心多次复制输入图像的一个角度。

id: The number of replications of an angle of the input
The angular offset of the replicated angle of the input
zh: 输入的复制角度的角度偏移

id: X coordinate of the magnifying glass center
zh: 放大镜中心的 X 坐标

id: Y coordinate of the magnifying glass center
The maximum scaling factor for the magnifying glass
zh: 放大镜的最大比例因子

id: The input image to be transformed
Creates a tileable version of its input image by moving different parts around to hide seams.
zh: 通过移动不同部分来隐藏接缝'创建其输入图像的平铺版本。

id: Width of the transition areas between parts of the input image
zh: 输入图像各部分之间过渡区域的宽度

id: The image to be made tileable
A tileable version of the input image
Performs a math operation using its inputs or parameter values
zh: 使用其输入或参数值执行数学运算

id: The default value for A, used if the corresponding input is not connected
zh: A 的默认值，在未连接相应输入时使用

id: The default value for B, used if the corresponding input is not connected
zh: B 的默认值，在未连接相应输入时使用

id: The result is clamped to [0, 1] if this option is checked
zh: 如果选中此选项，结果将被限制为 [0， 1]""

id: Shows a greyscale image of the result
Mirrors its input while applying an offset from the center
zh: 在应用与中心的偏移时使其输入得到对称图像

id: The Multi Warp  node deforms an input image according to the derivative of the second input image. Unlike Warp  node, the derivative of the second texture is sampled at each iteration  producing more varied results at cost of the performance.
zh: 多重扭曲 节点根据第二个输入图像的导数使输入图像变形。与 扭曲 节点不同，第二个纹理的衍生物在每次迭代时进行采样，以牺牲性能为代价产生更多变化的结果。

id: The intensity of the warp effect
The quality of the Multi warp calculation
The blend mode, that can be one of the following: Min, Blur, Max
zh: 混合模式，可以是以下之一：最小值、模糊、最大值

id: The height map whose slopes are used to deform the input
zh: 其斜率用于使输入变形的高度图

id: Creates a workflow map using a heightmap and an optional seed map. The workflow map contains height information as well as orientation and a seed for random offset for the material it will be applied to.
zh: 使用高度图和可选的种子图创建工作流图。工作流图包含高度信息以及方向和将应用到的材料的随机偏移的种子。

id: The maximum height of the workflow map, used as multiplier for the input height map
zh: 工作流图的最大高度，用作输入高度图的乘数

id: The angle stored in the workflow map
zh: 工作流图中存储的角度
输入偏移的随机种子图

id: The generated workflow map, to be connected to a MixMap or an ApplyMap node
zh: 生成的工作流图，连接到 混合贴图 或 应用 节点

id: Applies a workflow map to a base material, and generates height information as well as PBR channels for the result.\nThe height input must be connected to a Create Map or Mix Maps node. The other inputs must be connected to a base material.\nThe outputs must be connected to the Mix or the Output node, or a workflow filter node.
zh: 将工作流贴图应用于基础材质，并为结果生成高度信息和 PBR 通道。\n高度输入必须连接到“创建贴图”或“混合贴图”节点。其他输入必须连接到基础材质。\n输出必须连接到 混合或 输出 节点，或者工作流过滤器节点。

id: The Albedo channel of the input base material
zh: 输入基材的基础色通道

id: The ambient occlusion, roughness and metallic channels of the input material
zh: 输入材料的环境遮挡、粗糙度和金属通道

id: The emission channel of the input material
zh: 输入材料的自发光通道

id: The normal map of the input material
The height map of the result
The albedo channel of the result
zh: 输出结果的漫反射通道

id: The ambient occlusion, roughness and metallic channels of the result
zh: 结果的环境遮挡、粗糙度和金属通道

id: The emission channel of the result
zh: 输出结果的自发光通道

id: The normal map of the result
Combines the outputs of 2 mapped base materials (keeping the "highest" material).
zh: 组合 2 个贴图基础材质的输出（保持“最高”材质）。

id: The height map of the first input
The albedo channel of the first input
zh: 输入的第1个漫反射通道

id: The ambient occlusion, roughness and metallic channels of the first input
zh: 第一个输入的环境遮挡、粗糙度和金属通道

id: The emission channel of the first input
zh: 输入的第1个自发光通道

id: The normal map of the first input
The height map of the second input
The albedo channel of the second input
zh: 输入的第2个漫反射贴图

id: The ambient occlusion, roughness and metallic channels of the second input
zh: 第二个输入的环境遮挡、粗糙度和金属通道

id: The emission channel of the second input
zh: 输入的第2个自发光通道

id: The normal map of the second input
Generates the height of the result
Shows the output ambient occlusion, roughness and metallic channels
zh: 显示输出环境光遮蔽、粗糙度和金属通道
显示输出的自发光通道

id: Mixes up to 4 workflow maps, to be used with the same base material
zh: 混合多达 4 个工作流图，与相同的基础材料一起使用

id: Converts a workflow mapped material (from an Apply Map or a Mix node) for a Material node
zh: 为材质节点转换工作流映射材质(来自应用贴图或混合节点)

id: The strength of the calculated occlusion effect
zh: 计算出的阻塞效果的强度

id: The strength of  normals from the base materials (compared to the normal generated from height information))
zh: 来自基础材料的法线强度（与根据高度信息生成的法线相比））

id: Generates a grid made of black and white squares
zh: 生成由黑白方块组成的网格
生成 x 轴插值噪波

id: The scale along the X axis
The scale along the Y axis
Controls how much the noise is blurred along the x-axis
zh: 控制噪波沿 x 轴的模糊程度

id: Controls the type of interpolation used for the smoothing. 0 is linear interpolation, 1 is smooth interpolation
zh: 控制用于平滑的插值类型。0 为线性插值，1 为平滑插值

id: Generates a normal map from a height map
The format of the generated normal map\nIn most cases this should be set to default
zh: 生成的法线贴图的格式\n在大多数情况下，这应该设置为默认值

id: The resolution of the generated normal map
zh: 生成的法线贴图的分辨率

id: The strength of the normal map filter

id: Convert a normal map between OpenGL (default) and DirectX formats

id: The conversion that should be performed
Generates an ambient occlusion map from a height map

id: The resolution of the input height map
The strength of the occlusion map effect
The radius of the blur used for the occlusion effect
The quality of the blur operation used for the occlusion effect

zh: 八度数（较高的值可能会影响性能）

id: Generates several octaves of color value noise
zh: 产生几个倍频程的色值噪波

id: Number of pixel columns of the output
Number of pixel rows of the output
Number of color levels for each channel

id: Amount of dithering in the output image
A pixelated version of the input image
zh: 输入图像的像素化版本

id: If unset, end vertices of the curve are used only for orientation

id: Style of the output image (fill or curve)

zh: 为输入的白色区域生成的值

The poisition of the scale center

Shows white scratches on a black background

The resolution used for the operation

id: Controls whether the resulting ditance field will be tiled. Useful for patterns that extend over the texture bounds

生成的有符号距离函数

id: The shape generated by the repeat operation

id: Generates a rounded box as a signed distance function

id: The size of the box along the X axis

id: The size of the box along the Y axis
zh: 盒子沿 Y 轴的大小

id: The size of the box along the Z axis
zh: 盒子沿 Z 轴的大小

id: The radius of the rounded box

zh: 生成1个胶囊作为有符号距离函数i

id: An input gradient (generated, for example by a Tonality node) that defines a profile for the shape

Extrudes its 2D input shape along the Y axis

zh: 作为有符号距离函数的输入 2D 形状
在 2 个输入形状之间变形

id: The amount of the second input in the result
zh: 结果中第2个输入的数量

id: Generates a plane that can be used to cut other shapes
zh: 生成可用于切割其他形状的平面

id: Repeats its input shape on a grid.\nThis node does not support overlapping between instances.

zh: 输入对象作为有符号距离函数

id: The translation along the X axis
The translation along the Y axis
The translation along the Z axis

zh: 带符号距离函数的形状

The n-gon as a signed distance function

zh: 作为有符号距离函数的多边形

zh: 将形状显示为灰度图像

id: The position of the shear center
Draws a greyscale sine wave pattern
The amplitude of the sine wave function
The frequency of the sine wave function (i.e. the number of oscillations shown in the generated image).

id: Applies a blur effect on its input, following slopes of an input height map
zh: 按照输入高度图的斜率对其输入应用模糊效果

zh: 高度图，其斜率控制模糊过滤器的强度和方向

zh: 从高度图创建平滑曲率图

The contrast of the generated highlights

zh: 对输入采样多少次以生成曲率图

id: The intensity of the curvature map
The radius of the smoothing of the curvature effect

zh: 沿 X 轴的中心位置

id: Position of the center along the Y axis
zh: 沿 Y 轴的中心位置

id: A heightmap of the specified sphere
Spreads several occurences of an input image randomly.
zh: 随机传播输入图像的多次出现。

id: Check to splat variations of the input
zh: 检查输入的 splat 变化

id: A filter that samples sub-pixel details to make them visible
zh: 对子像素细节进行采样以使其可见的过滤器

id: The number of samples on each axis. High values will badly impact performances.
zh: 每个轴上的样本数。高值会严重影响性能。

id: The width of the sampled area. Setting this value higher than 1 will sample neighbouring pixels and antialias the result.
zh: 采样区域的宽度。将此值设置为高于 1 将对相邻像素进行采样并对结果进行抗锯齿处理。

id: Shows the supersampled image. Due to the performance cost of this node, it is recommended to connect a buffer directly to this output.
zh: 显示超采样图像。由于此节点的性能成本，建议将缓冲区直接连接到此输出。

id: Swaps the channels of its RGBA input
zh: 交换其 RGBA 输入的通道

zh: 要分配给红色通道的输入通道

zh: 要分配给蓝色通道的输入通道

id: The input channel to be assigned to the Alpha channel
zh: 要分配给 Alpha 通道的输入通道

id: Applies 3D textures to a rendered 3D signed distance function scene.
zh: 将 3D 纹理应用于渲染的 3D 有符号距离函数场景。

id: The height map generated by the Render node
zh: 渲染节点生成的高度图

id: The color map generated by the Render node
zh: 渲染节点生成的颜色图

Blends its 3D texture inputs, using an optional mask

重新映射的彩色 3D 纹理

id: The strength of the distort effect
The 3D texture used to distort Input1

id: Pattern generated along the Z axis
zh: 沿 Z 轴生成的图案

id: Repetitions of the pattern along Z axis
zh: 沿 Z 轴重复图案

id: Selects a 3D texture for a given color index. This can be used to map several textures into a single 3D scene.
zh: 为给定的颜色索引选择 3D 纹理。这可用于将多个纹理映射到单个 3D 场景中。

zh: 与其他颜色索引关联的 3D 纹理

id: Selects a 3D texture inside, and another outside a shape. This can be used to map several textures into a single 3D scene.
zh: 在内部选择一个 3D 纹理，在形状外部选择另一个。这可用于将多个纹理映射到单个 3D 场景中。

id: The width of the transition area between both textures
zh: 两个纹理之间过渡区域的宽度

id: The shape in which input1 is applied

Places 4 input images into a single output to create an atlas of 4 images. Chaining Tile2x2 nodes can be useful to create 16 images atlases.\nAtlases are used by remapping nodes such as CustomUV, Tiler and Splatter.
zh: 将 4 个输入图像放入单个输出中以创建 4 个图像的图集。链接 Tile2x2 节点可用于创建 16 个图像贴图集。\n贴图集用于重新映射节点，例如 用户自定义UV、贴块器和 散布。

id: Tiles several occurences of an input image while adding randomness.
zh: 在添加随机性的同时平铺输入图像的多次出现。

id: The number of columns of the tiles pattern
The number of rows of the tiles pattern

The number of neighbour tiles an instance of the input image can overlap. Set this parameter to the lowest value that generates the expected result (where all instances are fully visible) to improve performance.
zh: 输入图像的实例可以重叠的相邻图块的数量。将此参数设置为生成预期结果（其中所有实例完全可见）的最小值以提高性能。

id: A map for translation along the Y axis

zh: 沿 Y 轴缩放的贴图

The minimum value of the output interval
The maximum value of the output interval
Outputs the tone range around a specified value,
zh: 输出指定值附近的色调范围，

id: The center value of the selection
The width (in tones space) of the selection area

Invert the generated image if set

id: The width (in tones space) of the transition area

id: The scaling factor along the Y axis

id: Repeat the input if checked, clamps otherwise
zh: 如果选中则重复输入，否则钳制

id: An optional map for translation along the X axis
zh: 沿 X 轴平移的可选贴图

id: An optional map for translation along the Y axis
zh: 沿 Y 轴平移的可选贴图

id: An optional map for scaling along the X axis
zh: 用于沿 X 轴缩放的可选贴图

id: An optional map for scaling along the Y axis
zh: 用于沿 Y 轴缩放的可选贴图

id:
Defines the behavior beyond the limits or the input image:
- Clamp stretches the edges
- Repeat tiles the input
- Extend shows parts of the input that are beyond the edges
zh:
定义超出限制或输入图像的行为：
- 夹紧拉伸边缘
- 重复平铺输入
- 扩展显示超出边缘的输入部分
生成 特鲁谢 图案

id: The base shape of each tile of the truchet pattern
zh: 特鲁谢 图案的每个贴块的基础形状

id: The number of rows and columns of the truchet pattern
zh: 特鲁谢图案的行数和列数

id: Shows a greyscale image of the truchet pattern.
zh: 显示 特鲁谢 图案的灰度图像。

id: A uniform image of the selected color
The value of the uniform greyscale image
A uniform image of the selected value
Shows a variation of the input
Generates several images from a tileable voronoi noise
zh: 从可平铺的-沃诺伊噪波-生成多个图像

id: The stretch factor along the X axis
zh: 沿 X 轴的拉伸因子

id: The stretch factor along the Y axis
zh: 沿 Y 轴的拉伸因子

id: A value factor for greyscale outputs
The randomness of cell centers positions
zh: 细胞中心位置的随机性

id: A greyscale pattern based on the distance to cell centers
zh: 基于到细胞中心距离的灰度图案

id: A greyscale pattern based on the distance to borders
zh: 基于到边界距离的灰度图案

id: A color pattern that assigns a random color to each cell
zh: 为每个单元格分配随机颜色的颜色图案

id: An output that should be plugged into a Fill companion node
zh: 应插入 填充 节点对应的节点的输出

id: Warps its input according to a heightmap
zh: 根据高度图扭曲其输入

id:
Both warp modes extract their direction from the height map slopes:
- Slope warp intensity only depends on the slope
- Distance to top warp intensity depends on the slope and the distance to the top, and can be used to create mosaic-like patterns

A Transform node with translate maps can produce effects similar to Slope Warp and is generally faster.
zh:
两种扭曲模式都从高度图的斜率中提取它们的方向：
- 斜率扭曲强度仅取决于斜率
- 到顶部扭曲强度的距离取决于坡度和到顶部的距离，并可用于创建马赛克-像图案

带有平移贴图的变换节点可以产生类似于坡度变形的效果，而且通常速度更快。

id: The strength of the warp effect
The offset used to measure slopes
zh: 用于测量斜率的偏移量

id: The input image to be warped
Dilates its input following the contours or slope of an input heightmap
zh: 按照输入高度图的轮廓或斜率扩大其输入

id: The dilate mode (clockwise contour, counter clockwise contour or slope)
zh: 膨胀模式(顺时针等高线、逆时针等高线或斜率)

id: The resolution at which the contours or slopes are followed (higher values will be more precise but rendering time will be higher)
zh: 遵循等高线或斜率的分辨率（值越高越精确'但渲染时间越长）

id: The distance along which the contours or slopes are followed
zh: 遵循等高线或斜率的距离

id: The attenuation applied along the path
The height map whose contours or slopes are followed
zh: 遵循等高线或斜率的高度图

id: An input map that affects the width parameter
zh: 影响宽度参数的输入映射

id: Shows the generated greyscale weave pattern.
zh: 显示生成的灰度编织图案。

id: Higher values result in better antialiasing, but are more demanding to render.
zh: 值越高，抗锯齿效果越好，但对渲染的要求更高。

id: Higher values result in better tesselation quality, but are more demanding to render and require more memory.\nDon't increase this setting above 256 on slower machines!\nThis only affects the 3D preview when using tesselation, not parallax occlusion mapping.
zh: 值越高，细分质量越好，但渲染要求更高，需要更多内存。\n不要在速度较慢的机器上将此设置增加到 256 以上！\n这仅影响使用细分时的 3D 预览，而不影响视差遮挡贴图。

id: If enabled, the DirectionalLight will cast shadows in the 3D preview. This has a moderate performance cost.\nThe effect of this shadow is only visible when using a tesselated mesh or a custom object.\nChanges to this setting are only applied on application restart.
zh: 如果启用，DirectionalLight 将在 3D 预览中投射阴影。这具有中等性能成本。\n此阴影的效果仅在使用细分网格或自定义对象时可见。\n对此设置的更改仅在应用程序重新启动时应用。

id: A higher FPS limit may result in smoother operation but may use more CPU/GPU resources.\nHigher values may increase power usage, leading to reduced battery life on laptops.
zh: 较高的 FPS 限制可能会使操作更流畅，但可能会使用更多的 CPU/GPU 资源。\n较高的值可能会增加耗电量，甚至缩短笔记本电脑的电池寿命。

id: Simple\nLeft click to show\nRight click to disable
zh: 基础元素\n左键单击显示\n右键单击禁用

id: 3D\nLeft click to show\nRight click to disable
zh: 3D\n左键单击显示\n右键单击禁用

id: Pattern\nLeft click to show\nRight click to disable
zh: 图案\n左键单击显示\n右键单击禁用

id: Noise\nLeft click to show\nRight click to disable
zh: 噪波\n左键单击显示\n右键单击禁用

id: Filter\nLeft click to show\nRight click to disable
zh: 过滤器\n左键单击显示\n右键单击禁用

id: Transform\nLeft click to show\nRight click to disable
zh: 变换\n左键单击显示\n右键单击禁用

id: Workflow\nLeft click to show\nRight click to disable
zh: 工作流\n左键单击显示\n右键单击禁用

id: Miscellaneous\nLeft click to show\nRight click to disable
zh: 杂项\n左键单击显示\n右键单击禁用

id: Define a description for this item
Enter a name for the new configuration
Add current color as a preset.
zh: 添加当前颜色作为预设。

id: Pick a color from the editor window.
zh: 从编辑器拾取一个颜色。

id: Toggle the visibility of hidden files.
zh: 切换隐藏文件的可见性。
基础元素\n右键单击启用

id: Generate input as function (can be used in "Instance Functions" section)
zh: 生成作为函数的输入(可用于“实例函数”部分)
